header.tagline: AI/ML Developer, Data Scientist, and Creator.

paragraphs: I'm an AI/ML developer and data scientist passionate about building production-ready solutions and transforming data into actionable insights.
My expertise spans machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing. I enjoy collaborating on projects that solve real-world problems, and I'm always ready for new challenges!

items.name: Movie Recommendation System
description: Developed a system with content-based and collaborative filtering to suggest movies based on user preferences.
Engineered features from genres, tags, and ratings, using cosine similarity for recommendations.
Evaluated using precision@10 and MAP metrics for accurate top-N suggestions.

items.name: Language Translation System using Hugging Face
description: Built an English-French translation system with 90%+ accuracy using Hugging Face’s pre-trained models and transformer architecture.
Processed and translated over 1,000 sentences, demonstrating scalable multilingual capability.

items.name: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with vanilla JavaScript.
Features dark/light mode, dynamic content loading, and GitHub integration.
Fully configurable through JSON with automated README generation.

responsibilities: Developed ML models with 15% increased predictive accuracy for real-time applications.
Utilized Python and ML frameworks to create production-ready solutions.
Boosted model deployment efficiency by 20% through workflow optimization and team collaboration.
Analyzed datasets exceeding 300,000 entries and developed predictive models with Python.
Improved model performance by 20% through rigorous testing and optimization.
Conducted data preprocessing, feature engineering, and effectively communicated insights to teams.

categories.name: Achievements
items: Top 100 in AWS DeepRacer League (Reinforcement Learning & Model Optimization)
Top 10% of data science interns at Innomatics Research Lab Hackathon
